version_description:
+ Draw lighter or thicker lines with 3D Touch on your iPhone or Apple Pencil on your iPad Pro.
+ You can now share levels and solutions with your friends.
+ Even better performance and perfect, smooth lines.

We will never interrupt the game with messages and notifications, so if you have a free moment, please consider rating our game. Your support means a lot to us!

+ If you are stuck on a level, you can skip it now
+ Sound on/off button
+ Minor performance improvements

A surprise free update - You can now doodle in the new free drawing area! Hint: turn the sound ON ;-)
